verbose_text: Indeed, we found that the presynaptic effect of 5-HT on ANF synapses was mediated by 5-HT 1A Rs, because the selective agonist 8-OH-DPAT (10 muM) reversibly decreased the EPSC1 amplitude by 32.8% +/- 2.1% (XREF_FIG) and increased the PPR by 15.1% +/- 5.3% (XREF_FIG).
evidence: mediated by 5-HT 1A Rs, because the selective agonist 8-OH-DPAT (10 muM) reversibly decreased the EPSC1 amplitude by 32.8% +/- 2.1% ( XREF_FIG ) and increased the PPR
